page.title: netPanzer - An Online Multiplayer Tactical Warfare Game

section.title: Join Us!
section.p: The first goal to port netPanzer to GNU/Linux is done, now its time to extent, fix and cleanup netPanzer. So if you want to help there or at other topics, you are more than welcome.

dl.dd: To see the collection of prior posting to the list, visit the netpanzer-devel archives

If you are subscribed to the list then you can send an email to netpanzer-devel@lists.berlios.de . (Unfortunatley we only accept mails from listmembers now, since the list was a constant target of spammers)

dl.dt: IRC - the netpanzer IRC chatroom is at
